thread.title: Monte Nott
thread.title_full: Thrift Books reviewed by Monte Nott

author: Monte Nott
title: Monte Nott
text:
I had recently moved and put in a completely incorrect shipping address. I didn't realize it until the book had already shipped. Jordan at Thrift Books sent me a new book at my correct address free of charge. No questions asked.
The book was excellent quality.
I will be shopping with them more often!
